title: 才知道可以这么玩，水贴的标题要长长长长，妈妈说标题长很好地呢，你们看长不长，呵呵
author: zbl1115215690
txt_content:
[fly]发现了这么个指令呢[/fly]

[fly][diamond_block][diamond_block][diamond_block][diamond_block][diamond_block][diamond_block][gold_block][gold_block][gold_block][gold_block][iron_block][iron_block][iron_block][iron_block][iron_block][monster_spawner][fire][/fly]
[fly][/fly][fly][/fly][fly][/fly][fly][/fly]
还就真挺好玩
水下水，水啊

小黑怕水呢
呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵
